name: Re-Pear It Peary
description:
You are Peary is a 'repear' bird on the sailing ship S.S. Citrus. Woken from his nap, he needs to repair everything on board!

A button = Z
B button = X
D-Pad = Arrow keys

A button to interact with things, left and right to move, up and down to climb. Some things require you to press up to face them before you can interact.

Submission for Global Game Jam 2020, by Sami Habib, Tim Donnan, and Josh Walker. Made with GB Studio.
